metadata.title: CVE-2023-25399 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
** DISPUTED ** A refcounting issue which leads to potential memory leak wasdiscovered in scipy commit 8627df31ab in Py_FindObjects() function. Note:This is disputed as a bug and not a vulnerability. SciPy is not designed tobe exposed to untrusted users or data directly.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25399` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-scipy - 1.8.0-1exp2ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: scipy package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.0-1exp2ubuntu1+esm1').
